00004 std::ostream& AcquisitionData::print(std::ostream &ostrm) {
00005 
00006   ostrm << "AcquisitonData" << std::endl;
00007   ostrm << "Acquisition start? " << getAcquisitionState() << std::endl;
00008   ostrm <<  "Acquisition number in run " << getAcquisitionNumberInRun() << std::endl;
00009   ostrm << " In configuration " << getAcquisitionNumberInConfiguration()  << std::endl;
00010   if(getAcquisitionState()) { 
00011     ostrm << " Max. events in acquisition " << static_cast<unsigned int>(getMaxEventNumberInAcquisition()) <<  std::endl;
00012     ostrm << " Max time of acquisition/sec: " << getMaxAcquisitionTimeSec() << "." << getMaxAcquisitionTimeMus() << std::endl;
00013   }
00014   else { 
00015     ostrm << " Actual events in acquisition " << static_cast<unsigned int>(getActEventNumberInAcquisition()) <<  std::endl;
00016     ostrm << " Actual time of acquisition/sec: " << getActAcquisitionTimeSec() << "." << getActAcquisitionTimeMus() << std::endl;
00017   }
00018   ostrm << " Has dif data: " << getDifDataPresent()  << std::endl;
00019   ostrm << " DIF Triggercounter: " << getDifTriggerCounter()  << std::endl;
00020   ostrm << " DIF Number of buffer words: " << getNumberofDifBufferWords()  << std::endl;
00021   ostrm << " ***************************************************************" << std::endl;
00022   return ostrm;
00023 
00024 }
